Key: It's already autumn...

(I was walking back after school when I found
myself absentmindedly speaking aloud.)

(All the students walking home have changed their
uniforms to long sleeves.)

(The Tenou Festival was over, as were our tests.
Our daily routines were slowly returning to
normal... Or so I thought.)
(I happened to be facing a few issues.)

What is the meaning of this, Shido?
Explain yourself!

Depending on your response, it may not end well
for you.

What do you mean, it won't end well?!
I-I mean, what kind of explanation do you want...?

Hehe... You can't avoid it now, Shido. Drop that
fake mask of yours and reveal the truth.

I concur. Kaguya is right. I would like a
satisfying explanation as well.
Well, um...

Like I said! My dear, sweet darling is about to go
on a date with me. A DATE.
Get away from Shido this instant. Or else—
AHHHHHH! Wh-What are you going to do?!

(I saw Origami move to take something out from
under her skirt, and rushed to stop her.)

Awww, but darling and I are in love. Of course
we'd go out on dates. Right, darling?
Hehe... Seems like you want to get burned.

My... And all these times, you were always
approaching me.
Analyzing. Kaguya is jealous.

N-No, I'm not, dear sister...
Miku kept pushing that on me!
Sympathy. Kaguya doesn't have anything to push.

Yuzuru! Gosh, just because you're a little bigger
than me!
Correction. It's not a little, it's quite bigger.

Argh! Calm down, you guys! I never said I was
going on a date with Miku!

I knew it! Then Shido, you must go
on a date with me!

I cannot accept that. Shido is going on a date
with me because I am his girlfriend.

I beg to differ. Hehe... You come with me, Shido.
I'll show you such a good time,
you'll be in heaven.

Agreed. Kaguya is right. The three of us can go to
a cake shop that's known to be delicious.

I'm the one who invited darling on a date first.
Obviously you're going to go with me,
right darling?

(Everyone is inviting me. B-But, I don't know what
to do. I—)
Go on a date with Tohka.
Go on a date with Origami.
Go on a date with the Yamai Sisters.
Go on a date with Miku.
Next
Ask Kotori for help.
Just run away.
Hurry home.

Ask Mana for help.
Hustle with the Ai-Mai-Mii Trio.
Tonomachi is all I have. My best friend.
